participant_1.background:
I'd brag about my ability to connect with people and make them feel good about themselves.
i don t like music.
I am proud of the cleanliness of my home.
i write.
i don t have children.

participant_2.background:
I used to rely on my own strength to stay healthy, but now I trust God to help me.
I'm a bit of a loner, but I love spending time with my family on special occasions.
i have a poodle named nanette.
i am in high school.
I enjoy spending my free time outdoors, either riding my bike or playing with my dogs.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my dogs, riding my bike, and writing. What do you like to do?
I like to write, too! I also enjoy connecting with people and making them feel good about themselves. How do you stay healthy?
I used to rely on my own strength, but now I trust God to help me. I also try to eat healthy and exercise regularly.
That's great! I'm glad you have a good support system.
Me too! I'm also glad I have my dogs. They keep me company and make me laugh.
Dogs are the best! I have a cat named Oliver.
I love cats! I've always wanted one, but my mom is allergic.
That's too bad! Cats are great companions.
They are! I'm sure Oliver is a great friend to you.
He is! He's always there to greet me when I come home from work.
That's so sweet! I'm sure you two are inseparable.
We are! He's my best friend.
I'm glad you have such a great friend.
